replies.body: Hmmm will people be happy this time around or another disappointment 🤔
both
TBH, I'm not entirely disappointed this time. I got Mecha Aatrox, Pulsefire Riven, and Fullmetal Jayce. Thanks DiscountBot{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
that's good because Not Entirely Disappointed was his goal this year

none cares but i am gonna say it anyways. Entirely disappointed and frustrated that my friend who do not spend money and my second account on which i do not buy RP got great deals while i had nothing above 50%. The fun part is that 3 of us got the same skin "Bullet angel kai'sa" they both got it at 70% and i have the classic 50%. First time in years i do not buy anything from the shop, discount bot has been a bad boy this time, no presents for him.
i will give him a swift kick right in the wires
I got all 50%s as well... which felt really boring. Literally no variation in discounts for me.
The randomness on the %s really sucks when nothing is above 50%, and most are 30% or lower.
hi, I got 5 skins for champion I don't play, is it possible to get a new shop? {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Yeah me too
I'm afraid to click my shop. I own almost every skin just not the newest few. Will I even see any skins? Who knows find out next time on League of Draven!
do it
*Insert To Be Continued meme here*
Alexa play Roundabout

I got 3 60% discounts for champs I play.  Not interested in the particular skins though and I'm still not giving riot my money again.  That said, good job to whoever programmed the algorithm.  The process works and under other circumstances I might have bit on all 3.
we'll get you next time, Linna Excel
Okidoki.    :)
The shop was good to me this year i got masked shaco 60% and thunderlord ornn for 60% thanks Rito!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
i ban shaco every game
Y u do dis to {{item:3073}} me?!
you know why
i am not happy with discountbot for this
I'm just here for the Bilby comments
and they're here for you

My shop is empty (cause I have literally all available skins)  :/

I'd like to re-roll. :(

Discount Bot was drunk, so I told it to take the winter off.
20% off Sakura Karma was not something I thought I'd see.
that's a steal of a deal
It says “ you did it. You Bambooized discount bot.” Should I be proud?
If i leave it closed and start playing with a new champ. Will i have chance to get a skin for this "new" champion?
the deals are already decided--they're just wrapped up

Got Shadow Prince Malz at 70% and Arctic Cait at 60% both garbage skins and then BA Kaisa and Pizza Siv at 20/30% :DDD fuck you rito :){{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
It's ok Bilby...I'm here for you{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
I got heart seeker Ashe which I have been wanting for a while now even at a discounted price which was even better, it truly made my birthday today! ^-^
happy birthday!
Thank you! :D

Hey Rito it seems like in the last few I've been getting lots of skin offers for my mains that I have good skins on, should I play a bunch of games and fill my match history with Ekko games before opening so I get a skin offer for him? Or is it decided before I open the shop doors?
Given the last few stores have been pretty garbage for me, I'm not holding my breath.  Maybe I'll be pleasantly surprised, but Discountbot has only failed me in the past.
today is the day

No Star Guardian skins and SSG Ez.  Yes, today was the day for me.

Hubby struck out though.  All he plays is Heimerdinger and he got no Heimer offers?  But he got an Ez skin having played him only once literally months ago.  I think the formula does go a bit wonky at times.

Hey~!

Thank you!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
The shop is gone on December 30th and not January 7th?

I generally play support, my 3 highest mastery champs are all supports so Imagine my suprise when I open My Shop and find SKT Jax, Lumberjack Sion, Creator Victor, High Noon Thresh (actually like this one), iBlitzcrank, and Project Jhin. Of the two support skins that pop up I don't even play one of them, I have like 2 games played on blitzcrank over the past few years and those were in aram. 

I thought the Shop was supposed to offer personalized choices. Alistar has a ton of skins, Janna, Lux, Lulu, Brand, any one of which I have more games played than 10x all the other champs I got skins for (besides Thresh) combined.
bilby baggins lol
lol
Second time discount bot did a great job for me- every champion skin I got is someone I play a lot and at a pretty decent price
